en: The Royal Hong Kong Jockey Club

description.zh-cn: 香港一家于1884年11月4日成立的非牟利保证有限公司，负责提供赛马运动、体育运动及博彩娱乐，为全球规模最大的赛马机构之一。由香港政府批准，独家经营香港赛马、六合彩及海外体育运动赛事博彩。
description.en: A non-profit limited company established in Hong Kong on November 4, 1884, responsible for providing horse racing, sports, and betting entertainment, making it one of the largest horse racing organizations in the world. It is authorized by the Hong Kong government to exclusively operate horse racing, Mark Six, and overseas sports betting.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会的创会会员之一，并于1892至1926年间担任董事局主席。
description.en: A founding member of the Hong Kong Jockey Club and served as its chairman from 1892 to 1926.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会董事局主席。
description.en: Chairman of the Board of Stewards of the Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会行政总裁。
description.en: Chief Executive Officer of the Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 香港的行政机关。批准香港赛马会独家经营博彩业务，并对其进行监管。
description.en: The executive authorities of Hong Kong. It grants the Hong Kong Jockey Club the monopoly on betting and regulates its activities.

description.zh-cn: 澳门的赛马机构，曾与香港赛马会签订协议，在澳门接受香港赛马投注，直至2024年停业。
description.en: The horse racing authority in Macau, which had an agreement with the Hong Kong Jockey Club to accept bets on Hong Kong races in Macau until it ceased operations in 2024.

description.zh-cn: 香港政治人物，曾担任行政会议召集人，提议增加赛马会足球博彩收入税。
description.en: A Hong Kong politician who served as the Convenor of the Executive Council and proposed increasing the tax on the Jockey Club's football betting revenue.

description.zh-cn: 香港财政司司长，于2023年2月增加了足球博彩税。
description.en: Financial Secretary of Hong Kong who increased the football betting tax in February 2023.

description.zh-cn: 前香港总督，于1927年授意香港赛马会吸纳华裔会员。
description.en: Former Governor of Hong Kong who, in 1927, suggested that the Hong Kong Jockey Club admit Chinese members.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人，香港赛马会首批华人会员之一。
description.en: A Hong Kong businessman and one of the first Chinese members of the Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会首批华人会员之一。
description.en: One of the first Chinese members of the Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间日本占领香港的时期。在此期间，香港赛马会被改名为“香港竞马会”。
description.en: The period of Japanese occupation of Hong Kong during World War II. During this time, the Hong Kong Jockey Club was renamed the 'Hong Kong Race Club'.

description.zh-cn: 前英国女王，于1960年授予香港赛马会“皇家”称号。
description.en: Former Queen of the United Kingdom who granted the 'Royal' title to the Hong Kong Jockey Club in 1960.

description.zh-cn: 前香港冠军骑师及现任练马师，为香港赛马会1970年开办的首批见习骑师训练班学员之一。
description.en: Former Hong Kong champion jockey and current trainer, who was one of the first apprentices in the Jockey Club's training school established in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 一种由香港赛马会受政府委托办理的奖券游戏。
description.en: A lottery game operated by the Hong Kong Jockey Club on behalf of the government.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会的两个赛马场之一，于1978年启用。
description.en: One of the two racecourses of the Hong Kong Jockey Club, opened in 1978.

description.zh-cn: 香港的独立反贪机构，曾于1986年及1997年侦破涉及香港赛马的造马案。
description.en: Hong Kong's independent anti-corruption body, which uncovered race-fixing scandals involving Hong Kong horse racing in 1986 and 1997.

description.zh-cn: 指以不正当手法影响赛马结果的非法行为。香港赛马历史上曾发生多起造马案。
description.en: Refers to the illegal act of manipulating horse race outcomes through improper means. Several race-fixing scandals have occurred in the history of Hong Kong racing.

nodes.id: 香港赛马会慈善信托基金

zh-cn: 香港赛马会慈善信托基金

description.zh-cn: 由香港赛马会于1993年成立，专责管理及分配马会的慈善捐款。
description.en: Established by the Hong Kong Jockey Club in 1993 to manage and allocate the club's charitable donations.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会首位华人行政总裁。
description.en: The first Chinese Chief Executive Officer of the Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 由香港赛马会提供的海外足球赛事博彩服务。
description.en: A football betting service for overseas matches provided by the Hong Kong Jockey Club.

location.zh-cn: 中国广东省广州市从化区

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会在广东省从化市设立的马匹训练中心及赛马场，于2018年启用。
description.en: A horse training center and racecourse established by the Hong Kong Jockey Club in Conghua, Guangdong, which opened in 2018.

en: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology

nodes.id: 赛马会动物医学及生命科学院

zh-cn: 赛马会动物医学及生命科学院

description.zh-cn: 香港城市大学下属学院，获香港赛马会慈善信托基金捐款后更名。
description.en: A college within the City University of Hong Kong, renamed after receiving a donation from The Hong Kong Jockey Club Charities Trust.

description.zh-cn: 遮打是香港赛马会34名创会会员之一。
description.en: Paul Chater was one of the 34 founding members of the Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 遮打于1892年至1926年担任香港赛马会董事局主席。
description.en: Paul Chater served as the Chairman of the Hong Kong Jockey Club from 1892 to 1926.

position.en: Chairman of the Board of Stewards

description.zh-cn: 香港政府批准香港赛马会独家经营香港的赛马、六合彩及海外体育赛事博彩业务。
description.en: The Hong Kong Government authorizes the Hong Kong Jockey Club to exclusively operate horse racing, Mark Six, and overseas sports betting in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会与澳门赛马会签订协议，容许澳门赛马会在澳门接受香港赛马投注。
description.en: The Hong Kong Jockey Club signed an agreement with the Macau Jockey Club to allow betting on Hong Kong races in Macau.

description.zh-cn: 叶刘淑仪提议增加赛马会足球博彩收入税，赛马会对此表示反对，认为此举将“摧毁”其商业模式。
description.en: Regina Ip proposed to increase the tax on the Jockey Club's football betting revenue, which the Club opposed, stating it would 'destroy' its business model.

description.zh-cn: 作为财政司司长，陈茂波增加了对香港赛马会的足球博彩税。
description.en: As Financial Secretary, Paul Chan increased the football betting tax levied on the Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 在时任香港总督金文泰的授意下，马会开始吸纳华裔会员。
description.en: At the behest of then-Governor Cecil Clementi, the Jockey Club began to admit Chinese members.

description.zh-cn: 何甘棠是香港赛马会首批被吸纳的华裔会员之一。
description.en: Ho Kom-tong was one of the first Chinese members admitted to the Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 容显龙是香港赛马会首批被吸纳的华裔会员之一。
description.en: Yung Hien-lung was one of the first Chinese members admitted to the Hong Kong Jockey Club.

description.zh-cn: 在香港日占时期，香港赛马会被占领地总督部正式改名为“香港竞马会”。
description.en: During the Japanese occupation of Hong Kong, the Hong Kong Jockey Club was officially renamed the 'Hong Kong Race Club' by the occupation administration.

description.zh-cn: 英女皇伊利沙伯二世授予“香港赛马会”皇家称号，马会正式更名为“英皇御准香港赛马会”。
description.en: Queen Elizabeth II granted the 'Royal' title to the Hong Kong Jockey Club, which was officially renamed 'The Royal Hong Kong Jockey Club'.

description.zh-cn: 1960年代末发生的毒马案促使香港赛马会推行职业赛马制度。
description.en: The horse poisoning scandal in the late 1960s prompted the Hong Kong Jockey Club to professionalize horse racing.

description.zh-cn: 告东尼是香港赛马会于1970年开办的首批见习骑师训练班学员之一。
description.en: Tony Cruz was one of the first apprentices in the apprentice jockeys' school opened by the Hong Kong Jockey Club in 1970.

description.zh-cn: 廉政公署分别于1986年及1997年侦破了涉及香港赛马的造马案。
description.en: The ICAC uncovered race-fixing scandals related to Hong Kong horse racing in 1986 and 1997.

relationships.target: 香港赛马会慈善信托基金

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会于1993年成立香港赛马会慈善信托基金，专责管理捐款事务。
description.en: The Hong Kong Jockey Club established The Hong Kong Jockey Club Charities Trust in 1993 to manage its donation affairs.

description.zh-cn: 黄至刚于1996年成为香港赛马会首位华人行政总裁。
description.en: Larry Wong became the first Chinese Chief Executive Officer of the Hong Kong Jockey Club in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 因应1997年香港回归中国，“英皇御准香港赛马会”于1996年7月1日改回原名“香港赛马会”。
description.en: In anticipation of Hong Kong's return to China in 1997, 'The Royal Hong Kong Jockey Club' reverted to its original name 'The Hong Kong Jockey Club' on July 1, 1996.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会协办了2008年北京奥运会的马术比赛项目。
description.en: The Hong Kong Jockey Club co-organized the equestrian events for the 2008 Beijing Olympics.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会拨款兴建了香港科技大学。
description.en: The Hong Kong Jockey Club funded the construction of The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology.

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会捐款建设了海洋公园。
description.en: The Hong Kong Jockey Club donated funds for the construction of Ocean Park.

relationships.source: 香港赛马会慈善信托基金

description.zh-cn: 香港赛马会慈善信托基金于2018年向香港城市大学捐款五亿港元，资助其动物医学及生命科学院。
description.en: In 2018, The Hong Kong Jockey Club Charities Trust donated HK$500 million to the City University of Hong Kong to support its College of Veterinary Medicine and Life Sciences.

relationships.target: 赛马会动物医学及生命科学院

description.zh-cn: 为答谢香港赛马会的捐款，香港城市大学将其动物医学及生命科学院更名为“赛马会动物医学及生命科学院”。
description.en: In gratitude for the donation from the Hong Kong Jockey Club, the City University of Hong Kong renamed its College of Veterinary Medicine and Life Sciences to the 'Jockey Club College of Veterinary Medicine and Life Sciences'.
